abstract: Television viewers preferred unscripted fare on Tuesday, as an hour of “American Idol” on Fox dominated the night’s ratings and two hours of “The Biggest Loser” on NBC gained audience every half-hour from 8 to 10 p.m.
lead_paragraph: Television viewers preferred unscripted fare on Tuesday, as an hour of “American Idol” on Fox dominated the night’s ratings and two hours of “The Biggest Loser” on NBC gained audience every half-hour from 8 to 10 p.m.
